## Static visualisation

```{r, echo = FALSE}

staticplot <- function(indata, year){
  
  indata %>% 
    filter(year == !!year) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = gdpPerCap,
               y = lifeExp,
               size = population,
               colour = continent)) +
    geom_point() +
    coord_cartesian(xlim = c(400, 40000),
                    ylim = c(25, 80)) +
    scale_x_log10() + 
    guides(size = FALSE) +
    labs(title = year )
  
}


staticplot(gapminder, 1817)  

```

## Static visualisation

```{r}
staticplot(gapminder, 1917)
```

## Static visualisation

